document.full_text: nationals pitcher livan hernandez faced the mets a day after evidence was introduced that connects him, at least indirectly, to a convicted drug trafficker in puerto rico.
document.title: nationals 4, mets 3: hernandez puts aside concerns about investigation and halts mets' streak
lines_and_colors: nationals pitcher livan hernandez faced the mets a day after evidence was introduced that connects him, at least indirectly, to a convicted drug trafficker in puerto rico.
